mapper.select: SELECT DATE(order_date) AS label, SUM(order_totalprice) AS total_sales FROM total_order WHERE order_date >= CURDATE() - INTERVAL 7 DAY AND order_status = '결제완료' GROUP BY DATE(order_date) ORDER BY DATE(order_date)

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(order_date, '%Y-W%u') AS label, SUM(order_totalprice) AS total_sales FROM total_order WHERE order_date >= CURDATE() - INTERVAL 28 DAY AND order_status = '결제완료' GROUP BY label ORDER BY label

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(order_date, '%Y-%m') AS label, SUM(order_totalprice) AS total_sales FROM total_order WHERE order_date >= CURDATE() - INTERVAL 12 MONTH AND order_status = '결제완료' GROUP BY label ORDER BY label

SELECT LEFT(order_addr, LOCATE(' ', order_addr) - 1) AS region, SUM(order_totalprice) AS total_sales FROM total_order WHERE order_status = '결제완료' AND order_addr IS NOT NULL GROUP BY region ORDER BY total_sales DESC

SELECT i.item_name AS product_name, SUM(o.order_totalprice) AS total_sales FROM total_order o JOIN item i ON o.item_key = i.item_key WHERE o.order_status = '결제완료' GROUP BY i.item_name ORDER BY total_sales DESC LIMIT #{limit}
SELECT HOUR(order_date) AS hour, SUM(order_totalprice) AS total_sales FROM total_order WHERE order_date >= CURDATE() AND order_status = '결제완료' GROUP BY hour ORDER BY hour
